tool.name: GATE POSTagger v2.3.0
tool.help:
**What it does**
A modiï¬ed version of the Brill tagger, which produces a part-of-speech tag as an annotation on each Token.
**Required Annotations**
* Tokens in GATE XML format (will automatically convert from LIF) * Sentences in GATE XML format (will automatically convert from LIF)
**Generated Annotations**
* Token annotations in `GATE XML format <https://gate.ac.uk/sale/tao/splitch5.html#x8-1000005.5.2>`_ with part of speech from the Penn tagset given on the "category" feature.
.. class:: infomark
If converted to `LIF <http://wiki.lappsgrid.org/org.lappsgrid.serialization/groovydoc/org/lappsgrid/serialization/lif/Container.html>`_, the output will include `Token <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Token.html>`_ annotations with an added "pos" feature indicating the token's part of speech.
.. class:: warningmark
The output of all GATE tools is in the `GATE XML format <https://gate.ac.uk/sale/tao/splitch5.html#x8-1000005.5.2>`_. This output can be input directly into other GATE tools. To input GATE XML format to tools requiring LIF, use *Convert formats->GateToLif*
**License**
This tool is adapted from the `General Architecture for Text Engineering (GATE) platform <http:gate.ac.uk>`_, which is released under the `GNU Lesser General Public License 3.0 <https://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0.html>`_
